place.name: LISVANE
place.gazetteerText: LISVANE, or LLYSVAEN, a parish in Cardiff district, Glamorgan, on the SE border of the county, 3½ miles NE by N of Llandaff r. station, and 5¼ N by E of Cardiff. Post town, Cardiff. Acres, 1,338. Real property, £1,045. Pop., 226. Houses, 48. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £60. Patron, alternately the Baroness Windsor, andK. Kemeys Tynte, Esq. The church is ancient. Charities, £13. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
